Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: GenAI can give helpful feedback, but I think it is more from a general perspective and in a very superficial manner. For specific and personalized feedback, only a teacher can give. Sometimes I use GenAI to improve the flow of the paragraph. This way, I understand whether my text is clear and say what I want to say before I send it to my advisor. This is helpful because my advisor can then focus on giving feedback on the content without the trouble of first trying to understand what I want to say.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response:
GenAI = superficial and general feedback. So, I feel anyone can get this kind of feedback.
Teacher = in-depth and personalized feedback. So, I feel better because I know the feedback will be of high quality and focused on my work.
